financial reports ad hoc type
ad hoc reports Ad Hoc Report
section.para: Ad Hoc reports are completely free-form and user-defined. They give you the flexibility to create Financial Reports which do not fit neatly within the three standard statement formats.

note.para: Any Financial Reports created in the system prior to version 2.1.0 are considered to be Ad Hoc reports.

tip.para: Exercise caution before converting an Ad Hoc report to another report type. The process removes Ad Hoc group definitions, replacing them with standard statement format settings.
